title: I can't create custom games/use the Practice Tool?
body:
For the past few days, every time I try to click the "Confirm" button to create a custom game or use the Practice Tool, it makes the noise as if I pressed it, but nothing happens.
I tried client repair but it didn't fix it. Any suggestions?
 I guess I could reinstall but it feels like I'm reinstalling the game every single week to fix an annoying client bug.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me. Have you figured out a solution?

I know it's not necessarily what you're wanting to hear, but if that client repair didn't help, doing a full reinstall might be your next best bet. If that doesn't help, our tech guys might have a couple other suggestions they could toss your way if you reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
